title: [Large-Scale] Creative Language Art Production Training Using the Lotus Technique

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic language education and use of creativity tools
context.additional_context: A course strengthening elementary school teachers' creative content production capabilities immediately applicable to language education settings

learning_goals: Participants can design three or more original language education scenarios (such as fairy tales, role-plays, and poetry) using the Lotus Blossom Technique (LBT).
In a VR simulation environment, learners can revise creative works incorporating feedback at least twice and submit the final output.
Through peer assessment and self-reflection, learners can achieve over 80% satisfaction in terms of the creativity and educational applicability of their work.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
